name: Cold Served
description:
It's a hot summer day, and hot days call for Ice Cream! Serve everyone in the store their desired flavors, and leave no sweet tooth behind!

Controls

Arrow Keys - Move around 

(You can move directly to the ice cream machines by pressing right when you are on them. You don't have to go around the entire field!)

Space - Action

Actions powered by space:

- Grabbing toppings.

- Pumping Ice Cream and Syrup (Needs repeated spaces)

- Serving Patrons

Enter - Pause
